name: number-converter-alphabet
description: Convert a number to a representation in any base or in any custom alphabet

scripts.build:umd: webpack index.js dist/number-converter-alphabet.js && set NODE_ENV=production&& webpack index.js dist/number-converter-alphabet.min.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run clean && npm run build && npm run build:umd
